pages.text: seuseulo yeoljieo seon geudeullo hayeo maengsehago
saagham-eul jeojihaneun geudeullo hayeo maengsehago
hananim-ui malsseum-eul yeom-wonhaneun geudeullo hayeo maengsehanani
sillo neohuiui hananim-eun heullo gyesinila
geubun-eun haneulgwa daejiui junim-isimyeo geu saie issneun manmulgwa dongseo ui junim-isila
hananimkkeseo jisang-ui haneul-eul byeol deullo aleumdabge jangsighayeossnani
geoyeoghaneun modeun agmalobuteo bo hohagi wihaeseola
geulihayeo geudeul-eun cheonsadeul-ui hoeuileul yeosdeul-eul su eobsgo sabang-eseo hwayeom-ui dol-eul maj-eumyeo
jjochgyeona yeong-wonhan beol-eul bad-eulila
mollae mueos-inga humchyeoganeun ja issdamyeon chisosneun hwayeom-ui bulgil-i geu leul chujeoghalila
geudeul-ege mul-eobola geudeul-i mandeun geos-i hananim-i changjohan geosgwa eoneu geos-i ganghanyo hananim-eun geudeul eul jinheulg-eulo changjohayeossnola
geudaeneun nollago gamtanhana geu deul-eun biusgo issnola
geudeul-eun hungyeleul bad-euna juui haji anihamyeo
geudeul-eun yejeung-eul jikyeobona jo longhamyeo
igeos-eun bunmyeonghan masul-e bulgwa hadago hadeola
uliga jug-eo heulg-gwa ppyeoga doen hu dasi buhwaldoendaneun mal-inyo
uliui jinagan seonjodeuldo geu leohge doendan mal-inyo
illeogalodoe geuleohaneola geuttaeneohuineun neohuiui saagham-eulo inhayeo bichamhage doelila
geuttae han soliga ullyeo peojilini bola geuttae geudeul-eun seolo boge doemae
geudeul-eun malhalila seulpeudoda igeos-i simpan-ui nal-iguna
igeos-i balo neohuiga geoyeoghaess deon simpan-ui nal-ila
bulleo mo-eula malsseum-i iss-euni joeindeulgwa geudeul-ui anaedeulgwa geudeul-i sungbaehaessdeon geosdeul-ila
hananim oee sungbaehan geosdeul-i la geulihayeo hananim-eun geudeul-eul bul jiog-eulo annaehayeo
geudeul-eul meomchuge hani geudeul-eun jilmun-eul badge doenola
